page.title: 14POLICING OF THE MOORLANDS
page.content: SEARCHES-There are a number of reasons for searches, missing children and in bad weather missing hikers are the main ones.The following are used in the search;uniformed officers with local knowledge, dogs, horses and helicopters.If in a really inaccessible area mountain rescue are asked to help.Once the missing person has been found radio for medical back up and organise the transportation of the person if injured. VEHICLES-Because of the nature of the land the police need land rovers to get up onto the moors.In our area one is at Milnrow police station and the other is at Littleborough.If the helicopter is needed this comes from Greater Manchester Headquarters.
